statements: DELETE FROM blockchain_participants WHERE username = 'alice' AND reputation > 50;
DELETE FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation <= 20 AND username = 'bob';
DELETE FROM blockchain_participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice' AND reputation_score > 1000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND participant_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 1000.00 AND participant_id = 3;
DELETE FROM ParticipantRewards WHERE participant_id = 10 OR reward_id = 5;
